1.0.name: wordpress/youtube-post-search
1.0.description:
Youtube Post Search is a free Plugin. It can be used in post and pages with simple Shortcode. It can also be used in templates too. It gives real time search suggestion which can be clicked. When hit Enter it shows search results from Youtube.com with Thumbnails of videos and theirs Titles. When clicked on this link opens the video in youtube.com in new tab.

Features

  • Can be use in any Template
  • Shortcode with value for width of space showing results
  • Real time search suggestion
  • Can be use in any page/post
  • Shows nine youtube video results
  • Simple to use and update
  • Youtube video opens in new tab
